question: Will the match be a Draw?
description:
This market refers to the 2024 UEFA European Football Championship match between Portugal and France scheduled for July 5, 3:00 PM ET.

If the the match ends in a draw, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

Note: This match refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time. Extra time and penalty shootouts will not be considered.

events.title: Euro 2024: Portugal vs. France
events.description: asds

question: Will Kamala Harris be the 2024 Democratic VP nominee?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Kamala Harris is the 2024 nominee of the Democratic Party for U.S. vice president. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of official Democrat sources, including https://democrats.org/.

Any replacement of the nominee before election day will not change the resolution of the market.

events.title: Democratic VP nominee?
events.description: This is a market on the selection of the Democratic vice presidential nominee for the upcoming election.

question: Will Democrats publish letter asking Biden to drop out?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if 10 or more Democratic members of the US House and/or Senate sign on to any letter calling on Joe Biden to withdraw from the 2024 US presidential race by July 5, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be any such letter once it is released to the public.

events.title: Will Democrats publish letter asking Biden to drop out?

question: Portugal vs. France - Who will advance?
description:
This market refers to the 2024 UEFA European Football Championship match between Portugal and France scheduled for July 5, 3:00 PM ET.

If Portugal advances to the semi finals this market will resolve to "Portugal".

If France advances to the semi finals this market will resolve to "France".

events.title: Portugal vs. France - Who will advance?

question: Will Joe Manchin call on Biden to drop out?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Joe Manchin publicly states that Joe Biden should drop out of the 2024 presidential race before 12:00 AM ET on the first day of the Democratic National Convention, currently scheduled for August 19, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

Statements that the Democratic party should nominate another candidate other than Joe Biden will also qualify for a “Yes” resolution.

Statements that are hedged or express ambiguity, such as “We need to consider our options for the nominee” will NOT qualify for a “Yes” resolution. 

If the DNC does not begin by August 31, and Joe Manchin has not called for Biden to leave the ticket, this market will resolve to "No."

The primary resolution source for this market will be official statements by Joe Manchin or his official representative(s); however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Who will call for Biden to drop out?
events.description: asdas

question: Will Geoffrey Esper eat the most hot dogs?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Geoffrey Esper eats the most hot dogs in the 2024 Nathan's Famous Hot Dog Eating Contest, scheduled to take place on July 4, 2024. Otherwise, it will resolve to "No."

In the event of a tie, where two or more contestants eat the same number of hot dogs, this market will resolve to "Yes" if a contestant's last name comes first alphabetically among the tied contestants. 

The resolution source will be the official results announced by Major League Eating.

events.title: Nathan's Hot Dog Eating Champion
events.description: asd

In the event of a tie, where two or more contestants eat the same number of hot dogs, this market will resolve to "Yes" if a contestant's last name comes first alphabetically among the tied contestants.

question: Will someone else eat the most hot dogs?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if a contestant other than Esper, Webb, Wehry, or Bertoletti eats the most hot dogs in the 2024 Nathan's Famous Hot Dog Eating Contest, scheduled to take place on July 4, 2024. Otherwise, it will resolve to "No."

In the event of a tie, where two or more contestants eat the same number of hot dogs, this market will resolve to "Yes" if a contestant's last name comes first alphabetically among the tied contestants. 

If no contest takes place on July 4, this market will resolve to "Yes".

The resolution source will be the official results announced by Major League Eating.

events.title: Nathan's Hot Dog Eating Champion
events.description: asd
